headline.print_headline: Syrian Film Collective Rejects Biennale Honor
headline.main: Syrian Film Collective Pulls Out of Venice Biennale

snippet: Abounaddara, which received a special mention at the Italian event, said it was giving back the honor because of “an act of censorship.”
abstract: Abounaddara, which received a special mention at the Italian event, said it was giving back the honor because of “an act of censorship.”
